page.title: 06EVENTS IN NEW MILLS/DISLEY
page.content: Every year New Mills has a fun run which takes place in the early evening, just outside school. It is a one mile race and it has lots of hills to climb, so it is a hard race. People wear all sorts of bright costumes and everyone enjoys it. It sometimes rains but still everyone is cheerful. The best place to watch is at the school, people sit on the roof. It is an annual event and most people watch. Every year Disley has a procession where people dress up and New Mills band plays marches. People decorate lorries which have tableaux instead of goods. There are stalls at the back of the Ram's Head with games and a coconut shy. Later Morris dancers come and amuse the tired customers. by Daniel Jones and Gavin Jefcoate.
